newsitem.title: USA: LIPA board sets review of pact with Lilco.
newsitem.headline: LIPA board sets review of pact with Lilco.

text.p: The Long Island Power Authority said Monday its board will meet Tuesday to review the next steps in the review process of the authority's agreement with Long Island Lighting Co and Lilco's related agreement with Brooklyn Union Gas Co.
Directors will also receive a presentation on photovoltaic systems by industry experts when they meet at 1000 EDT/1400GMT in the Omni Center in Uniondale, LIPA said.
